li.label: witnessed ally's death
li.description: I saw one of my people die. I can't believe they're gone. I'll never speak to them again.

li.label: witnessed outsider's death
li.description: I saw someone die. I saw the light in their eyes, snuffed out as they fell.

li.label: justified execution
li.description: A guilty prisoner or guest was executed. It was justified, but I still can't abide the loss of life.

li.label: someone was euthanized
li.description: A prisoner or guest was euthanized. It was humane, but still heartbreaking.

li.label: someone was executed
li.description: A prisoner or guest was killed in cold blood. I can't believe this!

li.label: someone killed by organ harvest
li.description: A prisoner or guest died because the colony took body parts from him. I'm livid!

li.label: justified execution of colonist
li.description: A guilty colonist was executed. It was justified, but I still can't abide the loss of life.

li.label: colonist euthanized
li.description: A colonist was euthanized. It was humane, but still heartbreaking.

li.label: colonist executed
li.description: A colonist was killed in cold blood. I can't believe this!

li.label: colonist killed by organ harvest
li.description: A colonist died because someone took body parts from him. I'm livid!

li.label: innocent prisoner died
li.description: One of our prisoners died despite being harmless. We have a duty to take care of our prisoners. If we wanted them dead, we could have at least conducted an orderly execution rather than permit that barbarism.

li.label: colonist died
li.description: One of our people died. If only we'd done something differently...
